Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: selectionLimit
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Sets a maximum number of cells that may be selected, nil by default.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: hotspotHeight
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Height of top and bottom hotspots for auto scrolling.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: hotspotOffsetTop
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Padding between top of collection view and top hotspot. Defaults to 0.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: hotspotOffsetBottom
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Padding between bottom of collection view and bottom hotspot. Defaults to 0.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: baseAutoScrollVelocity
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Used to calculate auto scroll speed. Defaults to 0.5.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: logging
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Toggles selection and scrolling information output to console. Defaults to false.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: showHotspots
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Toggles whether to show a faded green view where the hotspots are.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: beginDragSelection(at:)
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Attempts to begin drag selection at the provided index path.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.name: selectAll()
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html#/s.abstract: Attempts to select all items, starting from the first item in the collection.

Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html.name: DragSelectCollectionView
Classes/DragSelectCollectionView.html.abstract: A UICollectionView subclass that enables contiuous selection of cells while dragging.
